    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                        java.io.IOException,
                        java.lang.InterruptedException
        Creates a GUI and a categorizer model for the Spanish chatbot. Runs the chatbot.
        Parameters:
        args - console input
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if file is not found
        java.io.IOException - if input or output exception occurs
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if timer is interrupted

      • getCategories

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getCategories​(java.util.Scanner categoryReader)
        Reads the file of all categories and responses that was used to train the bot. Stores only the possible categories in an ArrayList of type String.
        Parameters:
        categoryReader - the scanner used to read the file
        Returns:
        an ArrayList containing all possible categories

      • sortResponseData

        public static void sortResponseData​(java.util.Scanner categoryReader,
                                    java.io.FileWriter outputStream)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Reads a file containing categories of conversation topics and possible responses. Ranks the "difficulty" of each response on a scale of 0-1 depending on how common the phrase is, and writes the categories with difficulty data to a new file.
        Parameters:
        categoryReader - the scanner to read the file containing conversation topics and responses
        outputStream - the FileWriter used to write data to a new file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if input or output exception occurs is interrupted

      • rankPhrases

        public static double rankPhrases​(java.lang.String phrase)
                          throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                 java.io.IOException
        Ranks the difficulty of each phrase in a possible response category by finding the mean of the pre-determined difficulties of each word. Updates the .txt file to have each word followed by its difficulty (scale of 0-1).
        Parameters:
        phrase - the phrase to have its difficulty analyzed
        Returns:
        a TreeMap containing the initial phrases in the file as keys and their determined difficulties as values
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if input or output exception occurs
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if file is not found

      • trainSpanishModel

        public static opennlp.tools.doccat.DoccatModel trainSpanishModel()
                                                          throws java.io.IOException
        Trains the chatbot model using the traning data provided in a txt file.
        Returns:
        the trained model of the bot
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if input or output exception occurs
